title: SB 1186
content: The State of California enacts the following. The State of California enacts the appropriation of $647,443.32 to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for payment of accepted claims from various funds specified. The Controller is required to transfer surcharges and fees to a specific budget item as requested by the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board. The transferred amount should not exceed the total per claim filing fee and surcharge authorized by the Government Code. The board must report the recovered amounts to the Department of Finance within 90 days. The recovered amounts must be reported to the Department of Finance within 90 days of the enactment of this act. Three appropriations totaling $1,799,300 from the General Fund to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for the payment of claims accepted by the board and reported to the Legislature. Three appropriations totaling $1,929,540 from the General Fund to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for the payment of claims accepted by the board and reported to the Legislature. The sum of $936,880 is appropriated from the General Fund to the Executive Officer of the California Victim Compensation and Government Claims Board for the payment of Luther Ed Jones, Jr.'s claim. This act is an urgency statute for the immediate preservation of public peace, health, or safety.
